params.delegator: The delegator address. If address is zero, the commitment has no delegator
params.duration: The duration of the commitment in Epochs
params.peerId: Peer id which linked to the commitment
params.rewardDelegationRate: The reward delegation rate in precision

depositCollateral(bytes32[]).details: Deposits collateral for commitments. It makes commitments activeNote: this method consists of indirect potential delegator address update(set delegator to msg.sender if 0x0 before).

finishCommitment(bytes32).details: Finishes the commitment if it is in Failed or Ended status

removeCUFromCC(bytes32,bytes32[]).details: Remove CU from Ended or Failed CC. Need to call this function before finish the commitment

params.unitIds: Compute unit ids which will be removed from the commitment

removeCommitment(bytes32).details: Removes the commitment if it is in WaitDelegation status

submitProof(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32).details: Submits a proof for the commitment

params.localUnitNonce: The local nonce of the unit for calculating the target hash. It's the proof
params.resultHash: The target hash of this proof
params.unitId: Compute unit id which provied the proof

totalRewards(bytes32).details: Returns the total reward of the commitment. It includes the reward in vesting

returns._0: totalRewards total reward of the commitment

unlockedRewards(bytes32).details: Returns the total vested reward of the commitment

returns._0: totalVestedRewards total vested reward of the commitment

withdrawReward(bytes32).details: Withdraws the reward from the commitment

devdoc.details: Capacity contract is responsible for managing the commitments

params.delegator: The delegator address. If address is zero, the commitment has no delegator
params.duration: The duration of the commitment in Epochs
params.peerId: Peer id which linked to the commitment
params.rewardDelegationRate: The reward delegation rate in precision

depositCollateral(bytes32[]).details: Deposits collateral for commitments. It makes commitments activeNote: this method consists of indirect potential delegator address update(set delegator to msg.sender if 0x0 before).

finishCommitment(bytes32).details: Finishes the commitment if it is in Failed or Ended status

removeCUFromCC(bytes32,bytes32[]).details: Remove CU from Ended or Failed CC. Need to call this function before finish the commitment

params.unitIds: Compute unit ids which will be removed from the commitment

removeCommitment(bytes32).details: Removes the commitment if it is in WaitDelegation status

submitProof(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32).details: Submits a proof for the commitment

params.localUnitNonce: The local nonce of the unit for calculating the target hash. It's the proof
params.resultHash: The target hash of this proof
params.unitId: Compute unit id which provied the proof

totalRewards(bytes32).details: Returns the total reward of the commitment. It includes the reward in vesting

returns._0: totalRewards total reward of the commitment

unlockedRewards(bytes32).details: Returns the total vested reward of the commitment

returns._0: totalVestedRewards total vested reward of the commitment

withdrawReward(bytes32).details: Withdraws the reward from the commitment

CollateralDeposited(bytes32,uint256).details: Emitted when a delegator deposited collateral to commitment

params.totalCollateral: The total collateral deposited to commitment

CommitmentActivated(bytes32,bytes32,uint.details: Emitted when a commitment is activated. Commitment can be activated only if delegator deposited collateral.

params.endEpoch: The end epoch of the commitment
params.peerId: Peer id which linked to the commitment
params.startEpoch: The start epoch of the commitment
params.unitIds: Compute unit ids which linked to the commitment

CommitmentCreated(bytes32,bytes32,uint25.details: Emitted when a new commitment is created

params.delegator: The delegator address. If address is zero, the commitment has no delegator
params.duration: The duration of the commitment in Epochs
params.fltCollateralPerUnit: The flt collateral per compute unit
params.peerId: Peer id which linked to the commitment
params.rewardDelegationRate: The reward delegation rate in precision

CommitmentFinished(bytes32).details: Emitted when a commitment is finished. Commitment can be finished only if it is in Failed or Ended

CommitmentRemoved(bytes32).details: Emitted when a commitment is removed. Commitment can be removed only if it is in WaitDelegation status

ProofSubmitted(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32).details: Emitted when a proof is submitted

params.localUnitNonce: The local nonce of the unit for calculating the target hash
params.unitId: Compute unit id which linked to the proof

RewardWithdrawn(bytes32,uint256).details: Emitted when a reward is withdrawn

params.amount: The amount of the withdrawn reward

UnitActivated(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).details: Emitted when a unit activated. Unit is activated when it returned from deal

UnitDeactivated(bytes32,bytes32).details: Emitted when a unit deactivated. Unit is deactivated when it moved to deal

TooManyProofs().details: Throws if peer sent too many proofs for the commitment by unit per epoch

documentation.text:
@dev Emitted when a commitment is removed. Commitment can be removed only if it is in WaitDelegation status
 @param commitmentId Commitment id

@dev Emitted when a commitment is finished. Commitment can be finished only if it is in Failed or Ended
 @param commitmentId Commitment id which finished
@dev Throws if peer sent too many proofs for the commitment by unit per epoch
@dev Capacity commitment is not active
@dev Capacity commitment is active

@dev Removes the commitment if it is in WaitDelegation status
 @param commitmentId Commitment id

@dev Finishes the commitment if it is in Failed or Ended status
 @param commitmentId Commitment id

@dev Withdraws the reward from the commitment
 @param commitmentId Commitment id

@title Capacity contract interface
 @dev Capacity contract is responsible for managing the commitments
